```{r}
library(mlbench)
library(caret)
data(BostonHousing)
```
In this vignette, it will be shown how to do a simple prediction problem using ridgereg() function in the package "mlr" with the data _BostonHousing_ found in the mlbench package.

```{r}
head(BostonHousing)
```


###1. Divide the BostonHousing data into a test and training dataset
```{r}
inTraining <- caret::createDataPartition(BostonHousing$crim, p = .7, list = FALSE)
training <- BostonHousing[ inTraining,]
testing  <- BostonHousing[-inTraining,]

fitControl <- caret::trainControl(## 10-fold CV
  method = "repeatedcv",
  number = 10,
  ## repeated ten times
  repeats = 10)
```
